effect.then: I'm a big fan of New Zealand.
New Zealand is beautiful, but the best thing about New Zealand is the people.
It is kind of neat though, getting to travel all around the world. Through all these crazy conventions and expos and displays you know.
I get to see people of all different shapes and sizes and colors and orientations and it's pretty exciting stuff. I need stimulation.
It's neat to go overseas. You get soaked in all kinds of cultures and you know I need a lot of stimulation because you know how it is.
You know, I was hoping that we would have cars, and jet packs. Maybe someday we'll finally find ourselves in a country that realizes those science fiction dreams.
